title: fix: handle GitHub 403/429 rate limits in spore-to-seed upgrade
author: ElliotEtag

gist.summary: Implemented smart retry logic for GitHub API rate limits during the automatic Spore-to-Seed tier upgrade process.
gist.impact: Ensures active community members reliably receive their tier upgrades even during periods of high API traffic.
gist.visual_concept: The pollinations.ai bee tending to a glowing pixelated seed in a garden, representing the Spore-to-Seed upgrade process. The focus is on care and reliability (making sure the seed grows).
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the pollinations.ai bee carefully tending to a glowing pixelated seed in a digital garden. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel mint gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Represents growth and reliability. Nostalgic but beautiful.

image.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the pollinations.ai bee carefully tending to a glowing pixelated seed in a digital garden. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel mint gradient background.
